function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to the virus among field workers","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementing physical distancing measures and frequent temperature checks","Technologies":"Temperature monitoring technology, virtual meeting platforms","People":"Field workers","Owner":"Project managers"},{"Description":"Isolation and work environment concerns for remote workers","Impact":"Increased anxiety and stress for remote workers","Mitigation":"Frequent interaction with remote workers, promoting the use of technology for virtual meetings","Technologies":"Virtual meeting platforms, communication technology","People":"Remote workers","Owner":"Project managers"}]}
